ca.ualberta.team7project.models

Class UserPersistenceModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ca.ualberta.team7project.models.UserPersistenceModel

  • public class UserPersistenceModel
extends Activity
    Facilitates storing and loading the PreferenceModel to/from disk

    Utilizes Java's built-in serialization for objects implementing the Serializable interface
